mean_cn: n.精神病院，疯人院；避难所；庇护
mean_en: a hospital where people who are mentally ill are cared for especially for long periods of time :a mental hospital
sentence: He works in an asylum, taking care of mentally ill patients.
sentence_trans: 他在精神病院工作，照顾精神病人。
word_etyma: asyl养育院 ＋ um名词后缀，表场所 → asylum避难所，收容所
